attributes.action: Scrap The West London Tram Proposal
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This is a petition for all those AGAINST the West london Tram proposal that will run down the Uxbridge road in West London from Uxbridge to Shepherds Bush.

(I have also created a petition for everyone who is 'FOR'the West London Tram proposal called (( FOR-Tram )) Both will run for 2 months consecutively).
